description.value:
The barbarianâ€™s insight bonus to her chosen skill increases to +4. The barbarian can now select any skill to receive this bonus, even a Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skill or a skill that requires patience or concentration; if she selects such a skill, she can use it even while raging.

A barbarian must have the lesser ancestor totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.
